𒄄 ≈ 𒄀 GI gunu

𒄄𒀀 GI4.A •gyro #târuⁿ turn

𒄆 GI4 × GI4 gyro ?

𒄄 GI4 < QUAR 4 in 𒁖𒄄 city quarter 𓊖

𒄄 GI₄ guard in 𒅖𒄄 sahar-gi₄ dust-guard

𒄆 ≈ 𒐼𒎗𒐘𒎗 𒎗

𒄄 GI ≈ DJI in 𒄃 GIGI •giage ≈ judge

𒄄 GI ≈ DJI in 𒂍𒄄𒀀 ᵇeʳgia bride

𒄄 gi₄ˡˡ ki₂ˡˡ kill

𒄄 gi₄ <> good in 𒍣𒄄 on good terms

𒊑𒁕 𒋙 𒁹 𒆳 𒉡 𒄄𒀀
ri-da šú ana KUR NU GI4.A
take it down to the land of no return

𒀀𒄀 = 𒀀𒄄 a gi; a gi4 "to deflower" Akk. naqābu

𒄄;𒄀 gi4;gi •gyro to turn, return; to go around; to change status; to return (with claims in a legal case); to go back (on an agreement) #lamû;
